summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 11 requirements (REQ-6 through REQ-16). The backend data model, add product functions, search functionality, and frontend components are all present. However, there are potential issues with case-insensitive search implementation and some platform handling edge cases.

missing_requirements.reason: The backend search uses product.name.contains(#text searchTerm) which in Motoko may be case-sensitive. No explicit case-insensitive conversion (toLowerCase) is visible in the search implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: Category filter parameter in searchProducts function
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend searchProducts function includes a categoryFilter parameter that was not requested in REQ-12, which only specifies search by name, category (as search term), or platform filter.
These query functions were not requested in any requirement. Requirements only specified addProduct and searchProducts functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Price formatting with Indian Rupee currency
hallucinated_features.reason: The ProductCard component formats prices specifically as INR currency, but no currency specification was mentioned in the requirements.
